title: The Shy Lion Finds His Roar

pages.text:
This is Leo the lion.
Leo is kind.
Leo is quiet.

Leo has good ideas.
But Leo feels shy.
He does not like to talk.

At jungle school, Leo plays with friends.
Monkey, Elephant, and Bunny play a game.
They use color stones to start.

Monkey grabs the red stone.
Bunny grabs the yellow stone.
"I go first!"
"No, I go first!"

The friends pull the stones.
The game stops.
Elephant looks worried.
No one plays.

Leo knows the rule.
He knows which stone goes first.
But Leo feels shy.

Leo takes a deep breath.
"The red stone goes first," he says.

Monkey puts the red stone on the ground.
Bunny steps back.
The game starts at the stone.

Leo feels proud.
He did not roar.
He used his voice.
